instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Keep app . Tap the note that you want to label. To select multiple notes, touch and hold a note and then tap other notes that you want to select. At the bottom right, tap Action . If you've selected multiple notes, you can skip this step. Tap Labels . Tick the box next to each label that you want. To add a label, enter a label name in 'Enter label name', and tap Create . At the top left, tap Back . You'll see the label at the bottom of the note. To remove a label, tap a tag.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Keep app . At the top left, tap Menu . Next to 'Labels', tap Edit . Find the label that you want to change and tap Edit . To delete a label, tap Delete . To edit a label, enter a new label and tap Done . When you re done, tap Close .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Keep app . Tap the note that you want to colour. At the bottom right, tap Action . At the bottom, choose a colour. To save the colour, at the top left, tap Back .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Keep app . Tap the note that you want to pin. Tap Pin note .
